詐.definition: to cheat; to swindle; to pretend; to feign; to draw sb out; to try to extract information by deceit or bluff

詐唬.definition: to bluff; to bluster; to intimidate

詐屍.definition: sudden movement of a corpse (superstition); fig. sudden torrent of abuse

詐晴.definition: to clear up (of weather after rain)

詐死.definition: to feign death; to fake death

詐領.definition: to defraud; to obtain by fraud; to embezzle; fraudulent

詐騙.definition: to defraud; to swindle; to blackmail
